title: Cyclical Observations
description: Interactive map of bike traffic in the Boston area during different times of the day.

title: Weather Patterns in US Cities
description: San Francisco shows a unique relationship between rain and sunshine not found in other cities.

title: Is Less More? Analyzing Ratings by Recipe Complexity
description: In our fast-paced world people have come to appreciate convenience and appreciate time savings anywhere possible, so are recipe ratings perhaps biased towards quick-and-easy solutions to feeding ourselves and our families? We analyze a dataset of over 400,000 recipes to find out.

title: The Current State of Data Science: Compensation and Representation
description: As Data Science & Machine Learning evolves as one of the most dynamic and impactful domains in technology, we want to analyze trends and patterns using the 2020 Kaggle DS & ML Survey, which gathered responses from over 20,000 participants across 171 countries and territories.

title: Effects of Smoking on Gestation Development
description: We studied a dataset of 1236 babies to observe the difference in weight between babies born to mothers who smoked during their pregnancy and those who did not

title: Student Attitude and Behaviors Regarding Videogames during School in 1994
description: Using a 1994 survey conducted at UC Berkeley for students enrolled in statistics courses, we observed attitudes towards videogames, and academic outcomes.

title: Analyzing High-Density Palindrome Clusters in DNA Sequences
description: We aim to assess how the distribution of palindromes deviates from a uniform scatter across the DNA sequence and study if the clusters are due to chance.

title: Linear Model Accuracy on Non-Linear Data
description: Using data from a gamma transmission snow gauge in the Sierra Nevada mountains, we assess how linear models perform in this data exhibiting an exponential decay pattern.

title: Adopt a Classroom: Encouraging STEM Education in Underprivileged Schools
description: In Collaboration with the Puente program, we created activities and workshops to encourage STEM education in underprivileged schools. Provided fun STEM kits to students as prizes.

title: Computer Architecture Antics: Building a Raspberry Pi Mini Arcade.
description: Taking Computer Architecture just to build a personal arcade and have a legitimate excuse to allocate time for videogames. ðŸ˜Œ ðŸŒ¸

title: The Coded Gaze: Raising Awareness about Algorithmic Bias
description: In Collaboration with the Umoja Community, we raise awareness to the bias embedded in algorithms and the impact it has on marginalized communities. This project aims to increase representation in tech and data science.

title: Observing Broad Line Features Within Active Galactic Nuclei
description: Using a catalog from the Sloan Digital Sky Survey, we compared 2,000 galaxies with Broad Line AGN features to a large-scale sample galaxy catalog with over 500k galaxies in order to infer characteristics unique to galaxies with Broad Line features. This project was a part of my 2021 Lamat fellowship at UCSC.

title: EChALE STEM Loteria Dealer
description: A card dealer application for the EChALE STEM Loteria game, used during cultural fundraiser nights.
